channel.title: [562] AtomicScape - Help [562]
channel.description:
*NEW* -On AtomicScape Source how would I make it so that players can wield Inferno Adze and how would I add shops? -How would I edit the Server announcements?
I truly need help with the AtomicScape Source. The problem is that I cannot find the file to add commands and the command prompt that you use (`) to enter the prompt does not work.
QUESTIONS: -How to use command prompt -How to add commands (AtomicScape Source)
Examples: -I have opened the prompt using (`) and I am confused on what to enter to spawn items etc. -I have entered: ::item, ::pickup, item (alone), pickup (alone). *[To add on after I either entered ::item, ::pickup, item (alone) and pickup (alone) I entered the correct format that you would normally use such as ::item 11695 1 etc]
Adding commands problem/s: -I have searched for a file that uses :: and nothing will come up. I have also entered "command" into the search and it only showed me these files: *CommandScreenHandler CLASS File *[5 other files of same name] *content Windows Command Script *combat Windows Command Script *packetHandlers XML Document *CommandPacketHandler.java SVN-BASE File
These are the problems that I have encountered and if you will please answer them comment below. *(If you need more information comment)

item.title: [562] AtomicScape - Help [562]
item.dc:creator: @Chiller Chiller
item.description:
@Chiller wrote:

[quote=“i0wn3v3ry, post:4, topic:348884”]The Pro search is in the right hand corner under the date and time.
Pali and Bubly are bases.
If you weren’t a leecher, you’d know this.[/quote]
I’m only doing all this to learn to code I am not using this for my source.

Read full topic

item.title: [562] AtomicScape - Help [562]
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

The Pro search is in the right hand corner under the date and time.
Pali and Bubly are bases.
If you weren’t a leecher, you’d know this.

Read full topic

item.title: [562] AtomicScape - Help [562]
item.dc:creator: @Chiller Chiller
item.description:
@Chiller wrote:

[quote=“i0wn3v3ry, post:2, topic:348884”]Theres a pro search button right there and at google.
I suggesting using Pali or Bulby anyways.[/quote]
Pali or Bulby? I don’t understand what you mean by that. Are they server sources?
To add on where is the “Pro Search” be specific please.

Read full topic

item.title: [562] AtomicScape - Help [562]
item.dc:creator: @Chiller Chiller
item.description:
@Chiller wrote:

NEW
-On AtomicScape Source how would I make it so that players can wield Inferno Adze and how would I add shops?
-How would I edit the Server announcements?

I truly need help with the AtomicScape Source. The problem is that I cannot find the file to add commands and the command prompt that you use (`) to enter the prompt does not work.

QUESTIONS:
-How to use command prompt
-How to add commands
(AtomicScape Source)

Examples:
-I have opened the prompt using (`) and I am confused on what to enter to spawn items etc.
-I have entered: ::item, ::pickup, item (alone), pickup (alone).
*[To add on after I either entered ::item, ::pickup, item (alone) and pickup (alone) I entered the correct format that you would normally use such as ::item 11695 1 etc]

Adding commands problem/s:
-I have searched for a file that uses :: and nothing will come up. I have also entered “command” into the search and it only showed me these files:
*CommandScreenHandler CLASS File
*[5 other files of same name]
*content Windows Command Script
*combat Windows Command Script
*packetHandlers XML Document
*CommandPacketHandler.java SVN-BASE File

These are the problems that I have encountered and if you will please answer them comment below. *(If you need more information comment)
